# URLSource { #atdata.URLSource }

```python
URLSource(url)
```

Data source for WebDataset-compatible URLs.

Wraps WebDataset's gopen to open URLs using built-in handlers for
http, https, pipe, gs, hf, sftp, etc. Supports brace expansion
for shard patterns like "data-{000..099}.tar".

This is the default source type when a string URL is passed to Dataset.

## Attributes {.doc-section .doc-section-attributes}

| Name   | Type         | Description                          |
|--------|--------------|--------------------------------------|
| url    | [str](`str`) | URL or brace pattern for the shards. |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> source = URLSource("https://example.com/train-{000..009}.tar")
>>> for shard_id, stream in source.shards:
...     print(f"Streaming {shard_id}")
```

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [list_shards](#atdata.URLSource.list_shards) | Expand brace pattern and return list of shard URLs. |
| [open_shard](#atdata.URLSource.open_shard) | Open a single shard by URL. |

### list_shards { #atdata.URLSource.list_shards }

```python
URLSource.list_shards()
```

Expand brace pattern and return list of shard URLs.

### open_shard { #atdata.URLSource.open_shard }

```python
URLSource.open_shard(shard_id)
```

Open a single shard by URL.

#### Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name     | Type         | Description               | Default    |
|----------|--------------|---------------------------|------------|
| shard_id | [str](`str`) | URL of the shard to open. | _required_ |

#### Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                  | Description                  |
|--------|---------------------------------------|------------------------------|
|        | [IO](`typing.IO`)\[[bytes](`bytes`)\] | File-like stream from gopen. |

#### Raises {.doc-section .doc-section-raises}

| Name   | Type                   | Description                          |
|--------|------------------------|--------------------------------------|
|        | [KeyError](`KeyError`) | If shard_id is not in list_shards(). |
